trans-unit.source: This class represents all of the settings which must be specified to start a build.
trans-unit.target: 此类表示要开始生成必须指定的所有设置。

trans-unit.source: Creates build parameters.
trans-unit.target: 创建生成参数。

trans-unit.source: Creates build parameters.
trans-unit.target: 创建生成参数。

trans-unit.source: Constructor for use in setting all build properties programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 用于设置所有的构造函数以编程方式生成属性。

trans-unit.source: The ProjectCollection from which the BuildParameters should populate itself.
trans-unit.target: BuildParameters 应从中填充自己的 ProjectCollection。

trans-unit.source: Creates build parameters and initializes them from a project collection.
trans-unit.target: 创建生成参数并从项目集合初始化这些参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the environment variables which were set when this build was created.
trans-unit.target: 获取此生成创建时设置的环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Returns environment variables set when build was created.
trans-unit.target: 创建构建时返回环境变量设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired thread priority for building.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成所需的线程优先级别。

trans-unit.source: Returns the thread priority for building
trans-unit.target: 返回生成的线程优先级别。

trans-unit.source: Creates a clone of this build parameters object.
trans-unit.target: 创建此生成参数对象的克隆。

trans-unit.source: Returns a clone of this build parameters object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此生成参数对象的克隆。

trans-unit.source: This method creates a clone of the logger collections, but does not deeply clone the loggers within.
trans-unit.target: 此方法创建的克隆的记录器集合中，但深度不克隆中的记录器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the culture to use during the build.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在生成过程中使用的区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the culture.
trans-unit.target: 返回区域性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default tools version for the build.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成的默认工具版本。

trans-unit.source: Returns the tools version.
trans-unit.target: 返回工具版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the build should emit a detailed summary at the end of the log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定生成是否应在日志的结尾发出详细的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of a switch that specifies whether the build should emit a detailed summary at the end of the log
trans-unit.target: 返回一个开关的值，该值指定生成是否应在日志的结尾发出详细的摘要。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag determining whether to use the in process node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定是否使用处理中的节点的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag determining whether out-of-process nodes should persist after the build and wait for further builds.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定进程外节点是否应在生成之后保持并等待后续生成。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets an immutable collection of environment properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取不可变的环境属性集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an immutable collection of environment properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回不可变的环境属性集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of forwarding logger descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置转发记录器说明的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of forwarding logger descriptions.
trans-unit.target: 返回转发记录器说明的集合。

trans-unit.source: The toolset to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的工具集。

trans-unit.source: Gets a given toolset.
trans-unit.target: 获取给定的工具集。

trans-unit.source: Returns the toolset.
trans-unit.target: 返回该工具集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an immutable collection of global properties.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置不可变的全局属性集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns an immutable collection of global properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回不可变的全局属性集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a service that allows the host to provide additional control over the build process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个服务，该服务使宿主能对生成进程提供附加控制。

trans-unit.source: Returns the host service.
trans-unit.target: 返回该宿主服务。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义。

trans-unit.source: Returns a switch that enables or disables legacy threading semantics; true if enabled, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个开关，该开关启用或禁用旧式线程处理语义。如果启用，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Legacy threading semantics indicate that if a submission is to be built only on the in-proc node and the submission is executed synchronously, then all of its requests will be built on the thread which invoked the build rather than a thread owned by the BuildManager.
trans-unit.target: 旧的线程语义表明，如果要生成提交仅在进程上节点和提交同步执行，则所有其请求将基于的线程，从而调用生成而不是一个线程拥有的 BuildManager。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of loggers to use during the build.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在生成过程中使用的记录器的集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of loggers to use during the build.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在生成过程中使用的记录器的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag determining whether the build logs the input parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定生成是否记录输入参数的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag determining whether the build logs the task parameters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置确定生成是否记录任务参数的标志。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of nodes this build may use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此生成可以使用的最大节点数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum number of nodes this build may use.
trans-unit.target: 返回此生成可以使用的最大节点数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of memory the build should limit itself to using, in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成应限制自身使用的内存量（单位为 MB）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the amount of memory the build should limit itself to using, in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: 返回生成应限制自身使用的内存量（单位为 MB）。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the build node executable.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成节点可执行文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the location of the build node executable.
trans-unit.target: 返回生成节点可执行文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a flag that determines if non-critical logging events should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是否应丢弃非关键的日志记录事件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a flag that determines if non-critical logging events should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标志，该标志确定是否应丢弃非关键的日志记录事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether the build should reset the configuration and results caches.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定生成是否应重置配置和结果缓存。

trans-unit.source: Returns a switch that specifies whether the build should reset the configuration and results caches; true if the caches should be reset, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个开关，该开关指定生成是否应重置配置和结果缓存。如果应重置缓存，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch specifying if the operating environment, such as the current directory and environment, should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定是否应在各个项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境，例如当前的目录和环境。

trans-unit.source: Returns a switch indicating whether the operating environment should be saved and restored between project builds and task invocations; true if the environment should be saved, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个开关，该开关指定是否应在各个项目生成和任务调用之间保存并还原操作环境。如果应保存环境，则为 true；否则为 false。

trans-unit.source: This should be set to false for any other build managers running in the system so that we do not have two build managers trampling on each others environment.
trans-unit.target: 这应设置为 false 为运行在系统中，以便我们没有对每个其他环境中造成破坏的两个生成管理任何其他生成的管理器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flag determining whether to shut down the in process node when the build finishes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置生成完成时，确定是否关闭处理中的节点的标志。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the flag.
trans-unit.target: 返回标志。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets locations to search for toolsets.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要搜索工具集的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns locations to search for toolsets.
trans-unit.target: 返回要搜索工具集的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets all of the toolsets.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有工具集。

trans-unit.source: Returns all of the toolsets.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有工具集。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the UI culture to use during the build.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在生成过程中使用的 UI 区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the UI culture to use during the build.
trans-unit.target: 返回要在生成过程中使用的 UI 区域性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个开关，该开关指定在只有单个进程时是否使用同步日志记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns a switch that specifies whether synchronous logging is used when there is only a single process; if true, use synchronous logging, otherwise use asynchronous logging.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个开关，该开关指定在只有单个进程时是否使用同步日志记录。如果使用同步日志记录，则为 true；否则为 false。
